data.title: Mark Madsen
data.meta_description: Mark Madsen played in the NBA for nine seasons. He played with three Hall of Fame players including Kobe Bryant, Shaquille O'Neal and Kevin Garnett. From dancing celebrations at Lakers parades to coaching Madsen loves basketball.
